author: adrianc
msg: Ignoring a thrown ClassCastException is a common pattern in the project (one I have used myself), but it should be avoided in the future because it makes debugging difficult, plus it creates objects unnecessarily.

author: veithen
msg: Change unit tests to extract MIME parts programatically using JavaMail (instead of having the content as separate files under version control).

author: struberg
msg: removed redundant 'may not be null' from all Asserts.notNull

author: ylavic
msg: Makes more sense to join these proposals and comments.
